text: Chris Coletta (born July 29, 1972) is an American former cyclist. He competed in the team pursuit at the 1992 Summer Olympics. He graduated from University of Illinois and Harvard University. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:American male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of the United States Category:Cyclists at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Maywood, Illinois Category:American track cyclists Category:University of Illinois at Urbana–Champaign alumni Category:Harvard University alumni
title: Chris Coletta (cyclist)
